definition: to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]

sentences.english: You can sort the table on any of the columns in ascending or descending order.
sentences.chinese: 這個表格可以按任何列的升序或降序排序。

sentences.english: Sorts the elements of a sequence in ascending order by using a specified comparer.
sentences.chinese: 根據鍵按升序對序列的元素排序。

sentences.english: Required to merge the two lists, in ascending order by student number.
sentences.chinese: 要求把兩個鏈表合併，按學號升序排列。

sentences.english: The results can also be presented in ascending order.
sentences.chinese: 搜索結果也可以按升序顯示。

sentences.english: Click a column heading to sort the table in ascending or descending order.
sentences.chinese: 單擊一個列標題可以按升序或降序對錶進行排序。

sentences.english: When CVM is built with assertions enabled, this rank order will be asserted.
sentences.chinese: 當CVM使用斷言建立時，升序可以被斷言。

sentences.english: You may sort this column in ascending or descending order.
sentences.chinese: 可以對這一列按升序或降序排序。

sentences.english: Performs a subsequent ordering of the elements in a sequence in ascending order by using a specified comparer.
sentences.chinese: 根據某個鍵按升序對序列中的元素執行後續排序。

definition: tab window (in a web browser etc)/paging/pagination/page break (computing)
